vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
δοκῐμ-ή, ἡ,
proof, test, interpolated in [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__2 tried or approved character, [NT]

relatedNos._zh_tw_Gloss: 蒙悅納, 所稱許, 試驗
relatedNos._zh_Gloss: 蒙悦纳, 所称许, 试验

vocabInfos.mediumDef:
character, test, proof
trial, proof by trial, 2Cor. 8:2; the state or disposition of that which has been tried and approved, approved character or temper, Rom. 5:4; 2Cor. 2:9; Phil. 2:22; proof, document, evidence, 2Cor. 8:2; 13:3*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: carácter, valor ; prueba, evidencia (2CO.13:3) ; tribulación severa, gran prueba (2CO.8:2)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 試驗, 磨難 (林後 8:2)
2) 通過試驗的, 經過磨練的人格
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 试验, 磨难 (林后 8:2)
2) 通过试验的, 经过磨练的人格
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sự thử; sự thử thách; sự rèn tập; sự chứng nghiệm; thử nghiệm
